mapper.select: select t.positionname,t.maxnum,t.request,t.money,c.companyname,t.positionaddress from tbl_admin a,tbl_company c,(select * from tbl_position )t where a.cid=c.cid and t.aid=a.aid and t.positionstate='发布' order by t.positiontime desc limit 3
select c.*, t.Num from tbl_school as c left join (select sid,COUNT(*) AS Num from tbl_resume where reemploy='是' group by sid) as t on c.sid= t.sid limit 10
select p.proname,p.propic,p.prourl,p.procount,t.teachername from tbl_product p,tbl_teacher t where t.teacherid=p.teacherid LIMIT 8

select c.companyname,c.companypic, t1.Num from tbl_company as c left join(select t.*,a.cid from tbl_admin as a, (select aid,COUNT(maxnum) AS Num from tbl_position group by aid)as t where a.aid=t.aid)as t1 on c.cid= t1.cid limit 8

select t.job,t1.employ,t2.post,t3.talent,t4.company from (select count(*)as job from tbl_resume)t, (select count(*)as employ from tbl_resume where reemploy='是')t1, (select count(*)as post from tbl_post)t2 , (select count(*)as talent from tbl_user)t3, (select count(*)as company from tbl_company)t4
SELECT c.companyname from tbl_admin a,tbl_company c where a.cid=c.cid ORDER BY a.date desc limit 3
